name: Memorial: 2020 (@GDS Jam)
description:
2020 was a year straight out of some conspiracy lair. Welcome to our alternate reality memorial, where 2020 might have never happened. The biggest hoax on the planet for you to explore. So what are you waiting for? Grab the audioguide and stroll on into madness. Catharsis? Maybe. No warranty.

Concept, coding, guitar: Ondřej Paška
Audio/writing: Ondřej Trhoň

Created using: Unity, ProBuilder, Electric Zine Maker from Nathalie Lawhead

// materials from https://freepbr.com/materials/ // virus model from https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/corona-virus-e0f5e470cf864532b2a498b4ccdc3e91 // statue model from https://free3d.com/3d-model/statue-v1--541832.html // fist model from https://free3d.com/3d-model/hand-v2--144793.html
